column2: English: Atlantic) is a department of Colombia
column3: located in northern Colombia with the Caribbean Sea to its north
column4: the Bolívar Department to its west and south separated by the Canal del Dique
column5: and the Magdalena Department to its east separated by the Magdalena River. It is the third-smallest of the country's departments but its population of 2
column7: 517 makes it one of the most densely populated.

column1: Its capital is Barranquilla. Other important cities include Sabanalarga
